plays.text: Goal scored by Nikolai Zherdev assisted by Rick Nash and Michael Peca
Penalty to David Hale 2 minutes for Tripping Jared Boll
Penalty to Rick Nash 2 minutes for Hooking Dion Phaneuf
Goal scored by Curtis Glencross assisted by Gilbert Brule and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to David Vyborny 2 minutes for Cross checking Craig Conroy
Penalty to Ole-Kristian Tollefsen 5 minutes for Fighting Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Jarome Iginla 5 minutes for Fighting Ole-Kristian Tollefsen
Penalty to Rick Nash 2 minutes for Interference - Goalkeeper Miikka Kiprusoff
Goal scored by Daymond Langkow (Power Play) assisted by Adrian Aucoin and Dion Phaneuf
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Daymond Langkow and Kristian Huselius
Penalty to Gilbert Brule 2 minutes for Boarding Kristian Huselius
Penalty to Cory Sarich 2 minutes for Tripping Nikolai Zherdev
Goal scored by Kris Beech (Power Play) unassisted
Goal scored by Adrian Aucoin assisted by Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Elbowing Ole-Kristian Tollefsen
Penalty to Michael Peca 2 minutes for Tripping Dion Phaneuf
Goal scored by Curtis Glencross assisted by Kris Beech and Kris Russell
